title: Some great features
comment: I have tried A lot of browsers and this is one of the very few that will always display the address bar and the tabs.  No more having to scroll down to get them to reappear,  they are just there,  all the time.  And I love the customisable home button,  excellent and necessary addition for me.  Would love to be able to change the tab,  address bar colour for,  something A bit brighter,  but so far this is my fave browser.  Thanks!

title: bad
comment: no option or button to download video. no option to save link to spees dial. no option to put speed dial as intro page.

title: Nice
comment: Get flash support and stable

title: Disappointing
comment: A little buggy, a little slow, imperfect web renderng. I'm looking for an alternate to AOSP or the stock android browser which is bloat free and quick but has no ad blocker.  Promising browser but needs improvement.
Better than many

title: Small and powerful
comment: this browser can play flash content smoothly.

title: Great browser
comment: Great browser, would be perfect if back button didn't quit the app without confirmation.

title: no history?
comment: can find recent history

title: Nothing better than this
comment: Perfectly coupled with OS.

title: very very good
comment: perfect for background running youtube vids !! fast and good adblock addon
Awesome and works perfectly

title: It works.
comment: Very good app, much more than I had expected. It isn't perfect however as tabs often disappear if you go to home. This turned out to be a dealbreaker for me so I decided to uninstall the app. However, every attempt I make to do so is a failure and the app will not remove itself.

title: Fantastic browser.
comment: Great browser. I have paid for browser apps that pale in comparison to Tint. Bloat free and fast. I have tried quite a few browsers and scroll lag was always an issue. Till now. I can't say enough good things about this app. Try it for yourself.

title: Browser is fine but add-ons dont work
comment: Giving it 4 stars for the lay out but one less for add ons nit working the way they are suppose to. Thank you

title: Very slow
comment: The browser is very slow to load pages. Even if I have the ad block add on pop ups still do come. I have still get irritating pop ups. This is no different in anyway

title: Anthony Taylor
comment: Sir, for someone the types and spells worse than a inner city 2nd grader you should remain quiet. Seriously, you sound like a retard and reading your post actually hurt my brain. I'd be embarrassed especially in this day and age of spell check. I'm sorry if I offended any retards with my comparison.

title: Best Browser After Chrome / Firefox
comment: This is by far the best browser outside of Chrome and Firefox.  It is filled with options and the ability to customize behavior and UI to your liking.  Most importantly, it stays out of the way.  It doesn't clutter the screen, bringing up the menu doesn't result a screen dominating set of options.  After Chrome and Firefox this is the best along with the AOSP browser.  Great app!

title: A browser for people who know what they are doing...
comment: Insanely familiar to the stock android browser just so much better though
Surprisingly good and powerful browser.

title: Only the frames are tinted
comment: Nice clean browser but otherwise a fail for darkening on KitKat.

title: Worth five stara for the laugh....
comment: Guy assumes dude is an idiot because of flash but amy coder knows how easy it is to asd and a mashed extension to any browser.  They just went thru a phase wjere http5 was a bit quicker and easier to install but now with git and python....flash is a peice of cake and they actively tell people to use the extionions which u can now even get at the chrome store for android....lol..the ignorant calling someone who program s for anliving stupid...looool. Bet he thinks adobe air runs on feary dust. Runs well sgs5

title: Its good but
comment: You cant upload images in facebook through it which is annoying otherwise i would have rate it 4/5 . plz fix soon.

title: Does everything what browser should do.
comment: When I switch to old tabs it shows weird tiny picture of site -but when I scroll it a bit everything is fine.

title: Great !!
comment: One issue need to clear URL history on exit.Fix that problem I would give ten stars.Thanks for the browser.

title: So far impressive. Fail on page memory
comment: Not many permissions required. Https works..at least to google. Seems fast. But if you close a page u don't want others to see. It goes to home page...That's ok. Select the BACK option and the old page comes back up. Should either exit TINT  or stay on current page. NOT GO BACK TO THE PAGE YOU NO LONGER WANT TO BE SEEN.
Works well

title: Great browser
comment: Works great and I can use folders in the bookmarks, don't know of any other Android browser offering this. I just have two issues: 1.In tablet mode it's sometimes unresponsive, especially with multiple tabs (no problems in phone mode). 2. In phone mode it doesn't display the three dots and CM11 disables the menu key,  so I can't get into settings...
I guess what they meant when they said flash is that flash is needed

title: Doesn't really suit me but it's still pretty awesome browser
comment: Lightweight, easy to use, loads of settings, well made interface, I'm keeping it

title: Adblock
comment: Ap says it has addon for addblock but unfortunately it doesn't work at all

title: Love
comment: Im really excited to start downloading and playing it
Quite buggy
fast clear perfect all the best

title: LIGHT, CLEAN, FAST, GORGEOUS,
comment: ONLY A FEW BASIC PERMISSIONS REQUIRED!

title: Offline reading
comment: This is best android browser app, even I find it better than stock, but I really miss 'save page for offline reading' option, I don't want to install  3rd party app like pocket to do this, plz build this in, or even add it as an add-on.

title: Light & Simple
comment: This has got to be one of the best unknown browsers out there.  I use this more than Chrome for Android.  Not a whole lot of features (bells and whistles) but it's nice, simple, and lightweight.  And I Like That!

title: Best Open Source Web Browser for Android
comment: A very stylish and non-intrusive web browser.  Kind of quirky, but it seems that's the price you have to pay to use a browser on android that doesn't need to know your service provider, country, and device ID.

title: Fabulous Simplicity
comment: Well, I'm certainly not an expert on Android but contrary to one of the reviews here of flash being a no goer then as I live on Youtube I have to say I have no issues whatsoever with Tint browser Flash on Galaxy Ace 3 (4.2) merely by installing the last android adobe flash 4.0 and this trendy little browser plays Youtube videos perfectly along with in webpage vids too. The UI is truly stylish and is easy to navigate, no rotten adverts, many different settings and it 'IS' open source and although it's not the best browser I have I'm giving it 5 stars because I've had no issues at all with it (unlike many other brands) and in all reality I think some users expect above and beyond expectations for totally free softwares, some don't read the instructions on the lid and some don't have the specs to support some softwares (imho) There are ALWAYS room for improvements with anything but I'm not complaining here at all. It's a keeper for me Tint Browser team, have a fabulous day, Steph

title: Great little browser
comment: I like it a lot :) I know this isn't easy and its Google's fault, but it would be nice if you could bring back some form of text wrapping/reflow in 4.4 KitKat. Thanks!

title: @ lord childe
comment: Aye MITCH, Flash doesn't officially support jellybean and above but it still works flawlessly. I use flash player and dolphin flawlessly champ.

title: great open source browser
comment: Best open-source browser for Android.  Very fast and light-weight. I've been switching back and forth between Tint and Naked Browser Pro, but the latter has problems on Cyanogenmod Kitkat, so I've been using Tint more.

title: Error downloading
comment: Duplicate provider error

title: Awesome
comment: Exactly what I was looking for
Very limited options. Keyboard always stays open unless I manually close it.

title: good
comment: ics browser doesnt work on jellybean and its the best browser ever however tint browser is the nearest to ics on jellybean and works a treat. BTW in response to user Lord Childe, its not the browsers fault flash isnt supported just like on a pc you have to install it. Jellybean does not have flash installed by default. Flash does work on tint browser because my device is rooted so if you want flash you need to root your device with a custom firmware.
Good

title: Good, no ads, but not trust this for anything serious.
comment: A nice browser, works good, supports adding new search engines like duckduckgo and startpage. But if you use this for important works like banking, be careful not to multitask, especially if you have just 512 MB RAM, as if you open another app, this browser does not cache its open pages, but closes them all.

title: EXCELLENT.. Just 1 small problem.
comment: Was going to give 5 stars, But i have problems with Youtube FULL SCREEN mode.. its crashes instantly. But leaving small view always works.  Please fix  :)

title: Good One
comment: It is far better than any full featured on the store, bloating with stuff I don't use...

title: Lord Child is a idiot
comment: Ok flash is supported by this browser and while yes android jellybean does not have official support you can still install it

title: It's rubbish at the moment but I'll give 5
comment: 5 stars because it's FAST but needs a whole new look like Boat, Dolphin with no adds. Also not all HTML5 video's play please fix and ill download. Good job
I hate animations and I want to focus on website's content,tint browser is exactly what I want And it's open source!

title: Question
comment: Do this browser have adware in it?

title: fast but
comment: Although not the fastest, it has an ad block add on which is pretty nice

title: Very nice, but...
comment: it would be nice if we could change the color of the browser. Looking at all that black all the time makes me a little sad.   Other then that, I love it! It has great features and I love the holo look. 👍

title: Great
comment: Fast and light. Now Browser is lightest!

title: one fatal flaw - no bookmark sync
comment: unable to sync with my bookmarks. the native browser this is based on has hundreds of bookmarks synced that i can also access from chrome. i prefer this browser to either and am having to share pages with the native browser using flashify to bookmark them and retrieve them. very sloppy way to get much needed functionality.

title: Razr hd. (Jb 4.1.2)
comment: Very Fast + online flash work (!) + eat traffic ))

title: Good
comment: But opmin still the best

title: Flash support? Nope.
comment: Anyone who knows anything about Android and Flash will know that Adobe Flash Player does not work on Jelly Bean and above. The only way to watch Flash streams is by installing.specialist Flash browsers which process said Flash via the cloud. Tint browser is NOT a Flash browser, therefore a Flash plugin won't make a blind bit of difference.

title: Nice but fails to play live tv like al jazeera or rt.also no addon for playin video
Really good, w/annoyances
comment: Overrall pretty good.  Biggest annoyance is there is no way to "clean up" when done.  All tabs stay open forever unless you close them individually, or force the app closed with the remember tabs option set to never.  Also needs a close button to make that option valuable at all.  Also, if Flash hangs the browser, it hangs all tabs and all attempts to navigate anywhere (some kind of internal freeze).

title: Best ive tested
comment: Very stable browser. Very smooth gui. Extremely light compared to opera firefox or other mainstream browsers

title: Most lightweight and efficient
comment: much better than chrome, dolphin. As a bonus feature, Please add an option to show the url and tabs in the bottom of the browser, as it will be easy to use for large phones.

title: Good
comment: Job

title: More than 5 stars if I could
comment: Blazingly fast, small ram consumption, simply amazing and the only browser I need.

title: One which many others doesn't got: Maintain page without refreshing
comment: Most browsers refresh the page when the app is switched. But this doesn't and this is extremely small and fast and smooth... Excellent app!!  Keep it up!!

title: Great Browser Limited By One Feature.
comment: If you just added the intent feature within your browser this would get a 5 star, but as of right now I can't use this as my main one because of that. If I visit the Google Play webpage for an app through the browser it should ask me whether or not I would want to open that page in the browser or the app.   Naked browser does this, but it's not nearly as nice looking as yours - I'd love to make the migration if you just added this one feature.

title: 565 kb !!!!!
comment: And this good!  Havent stresstested it, but I like it so far...

title: Just what I was looking for!
comment: I love this browser! You can set your own custom search engine, you browse in full screen, it's extendible (add ons), ics/jb style so it matches with the rest of android, open source, it's quick and runs smooth thanks developer!!

title: Google login crash
comment: Solve that thanks cubot c9w android 4.2

title: Love this browser
comment: Does everything one could ask for and needs only so little space. Just one thing: could we get a new icon with a higher resolution? It looks blurry on my screen. It's a minor complaint but it bothers me.

title: Fast - only one minor quibble so far
comment: Would love to see the option to have new tabs start on the bookmarks page.

title: Good browser
comment: fast,simple...is there a way to delete homescreen bookmarks?

title: One word : AMAZING
comment: The best browser out there. Keep up the awesome work, dev.

title: Limited
comment: No option to choose yahoo as search ingine

title: Best of a thorough search
comment: Went through almost 50 browsers. Open source. Good set of features though not as fancy and "wow" as some, this is worth trying. Not bloated, no ads, quick. Best of the lot.

title: Great
comment: Top browser iv found gr8 work

title: File upload dialog still doesn't work with version 1.8
comment: Great, fast, simple keep up with the good work, thanks.

title: Badass app fast
comment: Get it it's all u need

title: Excellent job and keep it like that.
comment: Fast and simple no more browsers with huge memory this is the smallest memory and fastest cool app get it!

title: Ok
comment: One thing, hide keyboard after going to different page.

title: Simple - Clean - Works! The browser I have been looking for.
comment: I am puzzled as why their developers think, if someone wants a simple browser he also wants an ugly UI. Tint has an attractive and simple UI. Another plus: It requires only minimum permissions. Small issue: The bookmarks icons show the last page viewed under this bookmark, not the site they are actually linked to. Wish: An exit button which closes Tint and unloads it completely from memory, smaller memory footprint for the addblocker, choice to leave toolbar always open. Peter Kroll, Singapore

title: Works ok
comment: Browser works OK but the adblock add on for it doesn't at all so uninstalled straight away! This browser doesn't even block downloads and ask Me if I want it or not!

title: Keep crashing ! Pls fix it , TQ
comment: It is the best browser ever because it doesn't takes too much memory space and it's lighter than other browsers such as Firefox , Chrome , etc. But it's always crash and send me to home screen when I press reverse/back button after watching video in full screen . I really appreciate it if you fix this . And I will sincerely give it 5 stars .

title: Nice clean UI
comment: Would like view desktop site quick toggle in quick settings rather than having to go into the menus

title: Awesome
comment: Super fast and small, just add some add ons and it'll be the best
Perfect browser, open source.

title: So close ...
comment: This would be my perfect browser if swipe from the left for tabs had a larger target area. Also hitting the back button with multiple tabs open should not exit but go to the previous tab. At least this should be an option. Thank you for your work. Please continue!

title: Pretty cool.
comment: Nice UI.

title: Excellent but one (fatal) flaw
comment: I love nearly everything about this browser except that the back button will take you to the home screen and not to the previously open tab. Such an option would be much appreciated.
Fast

title: Tint doesn't ask to read texts
comment: Fast simple browser that is the least intrusive as far as permissions go. Does Not ask to read your emails, texts, and contact lists. Easy to use.

title: So much better than Chrome!
comment: Nice job! It's much faster than chrome, and still has all the functionality.

title: Best browser
comment: Finally a browser that delivers clean and fast web content.
Okay but doesn't always re-focus when double-tapping

title: DIDNT WORKED FOR ME

title: Nice concept but need download manager mode
comment: Small, fast, support add-on, private borwser just one feauture to be perfect... download manager bult-in browser... really i like this browser...!!! for minimalist people download it now !!!
Please improve your Google Play description.  Provide reasons this browser has been developed and why one would choose it over other minimalist browsers.  What are you trying for here?

title: Nice design but not very fast
comment: Its much slower on scrolling compared to Firefox and Boat browser but apart from that its good.

title: Update
comment: Search results won't open, instead this browser will only open the last page I was on. It has done this with every search.

title: Downloads?
comment: Can't seem to download some files correctly (doesn't completely download). Other than that, great app

title: Crashes too much now
comment: no spyware and open source, too. fastest browser I've tried on android yet. ...well that used to be true. Now it consistently crashes on all xda sub forum pages for me. :/ now I have to go back to the built in spyware browser. also cant seem to run facebook

title: Best Browser on Google Play!
comment: Hands down the best browser on google play... Keep up the good work! I have tried them all! Tint Browser is light, fast, supports video and has a clean interface. Note to developer: Please keep working on this wonderful browser. You have a gem here...

title: Love the UI
comment: I discovered this browser recently while browsing F-Droid. Very impressed with the user interface and over all feel.   Two things on my Wish list.  1. Drag scroll bar for quick scrolling.  2. Single toggle button or gesture to turn on/off the Invert Rendering (tint) mode.   I'm already using Sleipnir, Naked Browser and Opera but this little gem may just replace them all.

title: Force closes
comment: Kept forclosing on 4.3 s4. Sent bug reports.

title: My new default browser
comment: Fast, flash support, and the usual functions neatly presented. Only improvement would be to auto hide the address bar which is becoming the norm now. At the moment this can only be done using the 'phone legacy' UI, which I use and is fine, but the feature should exist across the other UI's. Do this and you get the 5th star! :)

title: Im tired of
comment: It fing crashing getting rid of it

title: Sometimes doesn't respond to taps
comment: The app doesn't hang, sometimes it just won't respond to me tapping any links. I can scroll ok, but it will just ignore link presses on some sites.

title: Badass minimalist browser
comment: So functional, yet so light on memory, plus it's easy to use. Love the tabs being placed on left side of interface, hidden at will. Best of all, YouTube runs faster on this than on the default browser. What else could I ask for?

title: Very good
comment: I love it. Very fast. If only you could make the address bar auto-hide like many Android browsers do now this would be a fantastic browser. Oh yeah, and I'd really appreciate being able to customise the home screen to only show my bookmarks like most browsers do.

title: Accept No Substitutes
comment: Only browser with satisfactory search engine options. Well done.

comment: I got a problem installing this browser a message popup 'Duplicate provider authority' everytime when its installing..

title: Good
comment: Flash Player works on the JB. Very fast.

title: Download...

title: Very good.
comment: Everything is good except two things. No exit button, and can't fix screen size for phone. Still easier to close then stock browser...
Excellent browser works fast and.good

title: Best android browser.
comment: Just really wish there was a home button at the top, like on a computer. If you added that I would be very happy.

title: Still some minor bugs, but really good.
comment: Not the fastest, but fast and accurate render. An all rounder in functions an design.

comment: If you push the back button on the phone it closes the browser, to switch between tabs you have to push the tabs button on top thats kinda stupid especially if a link opened up a new tab

title: Slick
comment: Plays my favorite flash sites smoothly. Love the full screen mode.

title: Good but
comment: Suggestions for developer its is fast than other like crome and Firefox but its become best if you add feature of compression web or any other tech so it will save mb in browsing because many people use limited mb plans

title: Excellent app.
comment: Fast lightweight and very functional. :-)

title: awesome
comment: I love it

comment: Youtube in the background tab-very nice, just fix user agent, doesn't work at all, I'm always recognized as mobile

title: One of the few better browsers
comment: Please keep working on this web browser. Experienced a crash when getting into private settings. But overall I really like the stock feel and simplicity. I think the resolution needs to improve. Layout seems a little blurry at times.
Very fast and great Flash support on Nexus 7.

title: Great!
comment: It's faster than Google Chrome. It's simpler and has more features than the stock browser. Overall, I recommend this app and can't wait for more features the developers have up their sleeve!
I use this browser on my tablet. Easy, ergonomic and fast.

title: Great lightweight browser!
comment: This browser is fast, lightweight, easy to use, AND open source! I just hope it doesn't get bloated overtime.

title: Nice
comment: But it isnt smooth on my note.. and force closes frequently for some reason! Hopefully gets fixed soon!

title: Very good
comment: Very good and support flash

title: Fast, reasonably attractive but lacking some features.
comment: As a touch browser it`s pretty good. You could almost mistake the UI for a slightly prettier version of the stock browser, it zooms about the net quickly and allows a fair amount of customisation. However, users of bluetooth/USB keyboards appear to have been left in the dark so it`s pretty much ruled out for tv/desktop use without support for keyboard shortcuts. In a market full of browsers Tint just doesn`t seem to do enough to stand out.

title: Pretty Good Browser
comment: “Remember Password" window reappears when dismissed during Google account setup.  Location access prompt appears every time for Google regardless of checking the “remember choice" box.

title: Great browser
comment: The ui is awesome very intuitive, Flash content is displayed  correctly and pretty fast also. One tiny thing I find annoying is that when I press back on a new tab opened, the browser will stop and return to home screen. Can u make it so that it will close the current tab and return to previous tab?

title: Love it. I found the option I wanted. Nice and minimal
comment: I really enjoy the temporary showing of the interface when you were using the fullscreen option. This is the power feature :-)

comment: Often crashed on my tab

title: Really good
comment: My favorite browser on the market. Just needs to fix some graphical glitches and it's perfect.

title: Screen starts breaking up and flashing...
comment: If I have 5 or more tabs open at once.  Other than that this is a great browser.

title: Needs text reflow
comment: It would be a great browser with text reflow, which is essential on a phone. Naked Browser has that and other good internals, but a terrible interface. Tint has a nice skin, but lacks some of Naked Browser's functionality.

title: Crash City!
comment: I was on The Verge website and this crashed the first 3 times I tried using it. Uninstalled.
Fast!

title: Fast, stable, holo theme, add-ons, lots of features
comment: Honestly, the only problems I can find are that bookmarked sites appear at the very bottom of the suggestions when typing a URL (it's typically faster to type in the full site address and hit enter than scroll all the way down or look through your bookmarked sites), and the top part that displays both the page name and site logo don't go blank after closing all tabs. Please fix!

title: This browser is like naked browser... But better
comment: I've been using Naked Browser for my Pad TF300T since Naked Browser is really fast... But I hated the UI and nice looking UI is huge for me. Luckily, Tint browser is as fast as Naked Browser while bringing amazing looking Holo UI! I think I will use this on my Nexus 4 too if the Chrome bookmark sync is possible through either the browser itself or the addon like Firefox importer. Good job overall though! Really impressed!

title: Wow
comment: This browser's really good. It loads full blown pages as stable and quick as a mini browser (like opera mini). I even like the simple UI and it works well on a tablet. My only complaint is that it doesn't seem to handle gifs very well at the moment

title: very nice
comment: good

comment: This could be one of the best browsers.. just add load images over wifi only option and bookmarks import pleeease

title: Great little browser

comment: I like it a lot only tested odd few sites but seems good enough

title: good browser

Simply then fastest and best browser

title: Tabs

title: Sucks
comment: No YouTube. Pages won't load.  Nice it has a home button though.

title: O.o
comment: Only 1000+ downloads for the best available Browser, which is also open source?

title: Finally a decent browser!
comment: Okay, let's face it there are a million different browsers around for android. I've tried them all, some have their pros but most have flaws that make them unusable in one way or another. I came across this little gem quite by accident, and iam very impressed. Its as fast as dolphin but its interface and style is way better. Really love this browser and hope to see lots of future updates. Big thank you to the developer.

title: Very
comment: Good

title: Proper full screen needed
comment: Toolbar taking up too much space at top of screen. Would love to see your implementation of AOSP browser's Quick Controls.

title: Finally a great browser
comment: Out of the 20 or so browser that I tried in 2 years, all of them were good at some things and bad at others. But tint is great at everything!  No facebook post errors like chrome, no trouble with video playback on 4.1.1 like firefox, has ad-block unlike stock browser and bookmarks are easy to manage unlike dolphin and opera. As a bonus, it look sleek on 1080p asus tf700, not overscaled like all others.

title: Everything you need in a browser
comment: Thanks for a great browser. I have an issue though: when I re-launch the browser (cold start) or simply start it again after being away from my tablet for a while, a random previously-visited page opens. Maybe adding an Exit button would help?

title: Light and Fast
comment: Small and fast, great for surfing on mobile data! Would be great if there was a shortcut toggle for invert option for those of us who prefer a dark screen/night reading

title: Best looking browser
comment: This is overall one of the fastest and better themed browsers out there but it lacks in the department of fluidity while scrolling through websites like Facebook or whatnot

title: It works. But feels incomplete.
comment: It would be nice to disable full screen. Restore after crash would be nice too.

title: Needs full screen!
comment: Great, fast. Needs true full screen to hide status bar.

title: nice but...
comment: 1. should add an option to choose what the start page would display (bookmarks/recent visits/most visits/...) 2. pressing back button should go to the start page instead of quiting the browser if start page is set as home page

title: It may just have dethroned dolphin browser.
comment: It is just that smooth. The only browser that comes even close is dolphin with jetpack, and I still think this might be faster...

title: Fast but has bugs
comment: Fast and smooth experience but has issue - after closing an incognito tab and switching to another app and coming back to Tint browser the sound is still going from the closed incognito tab. Please fix this.

title: Good but not prime time yet.
comment: I will give it that is is quick and smooth, a nice browser for the viewing of web pages. I have come across an issue I can only duplicate on a some websites. Using Facebook as an example, if I go to update my status, I do not get my keyboard to popup to enter any info, I have come across this issue on several sites, yet something like Google to enter a search, no issue. It is a nice browser that just needs to work out a couple of kinks, I like that it is small and quick and look forward to it's evolution.

title: Excellent browser
comment: Runs very nicely on my Galaxy tablet. Flash integration is good
Super !!

title: Nearly there
comment: this is by far the smoothest browsing experience i have had on android!!  the tab grouping is the only thing stopping this from being my primary browser.  really hope work continues on this browser.

title: Will rate higher
comment: Flash is enabled all the time on jelly bean galaxy nexus. Please fix. And add tab browsing option like dolphin browser xD

title: awesome!
comment: by far the fastest ive seen ever!

title: Tiny but powerful.
comment: Can't wait to see where this goes!

title: Nice job
comment: This browser is great. It runs quicker then chrome and is made from open source software. Its impressive because its better then almost all the other browsers, yet its so simple and made from a unknown developer. Puts the others to shame. Nice job dev :)

title: Not bad
comment: Seems OK. Small download and smooth experience. If you added these it would be really nice  Autohide ui swipe left and right

title: Galaxy tab 7.7
comment: Works beautifully, I use stock browser with java deactivated, and this one for full web experience, you Sir are my favorite browser dev!

title: Extremely pleased.
comment: I'm so glad I found this browser. It's fast, light on battery/ram/CPU and all round a pleasure to use. Thoroughly recommend that you try this out.

title: randomly found this...
comment: This browser looks and works great on my HP Touchpad running ICS! I was wanting a browser with nice looking tabs, and Chrome doesn't work well. I think I'll even be using this over Dolphin. Thanks, developers!

title: Font size
comment: Please add minimum font size setting, just like the stock browser.

title: hmmm
comment: not userfrendly interface

title: Sweet!
comment: Love the "just right" functionality and UI.
